assistantfinal{
  "summary": "Provides synchronous and asynchronous clients for interacting with the backend API to manage applications, their deployment variants, and associated environments. The module supports creating applications, adding variants from container images or templates, retrieving specific variants, listing applications, variants, and environments, handling environment revisions, and removing applications.",
  "business_intent": "Enables developers and automation scripts to programmatically control the full lifecycle of applications in a cloud platform, facilitating deployment, versioning, and environment management through both blocking and non‑blocking API calls.",

    "resource cleanup"
  ]
}
